Rakuten Technology Conference 2025 @ Rakuten Osaka Branch

Introduction / ç´¹ä»‹

ã€ŒAI-nization with Uã€

We're thrilled to announce that the Rakuten Technology Conference is returning to our Rakuten Osaka branch in 2025!

Get ready for a day packed with unique Osaka-original content and a lineup of fascinating sessions that you won't want to miss.

We're currently finalizing the session details, and as soon as we're confirmed, we'll be updating the timetable right here. So, stay tuned for an exciting agenda! In addition to our main sessions, we are also planning a special workshop where you can experience developing AI agents. (Details will be available on the timetable soon!)

We are excited to invite you to our networking party, which will take place during the lunch break! This will be a great opportunity where many participants and our employees can enjoy a complimentary lunch while engaging in deep discussions about AI and the latest development trends. We'll also be providing complimentary beverages and snacks to facilitate your conversations.

Feel free to join for a short while or mingle throughout the lunch hour â€“ your participation is entirely flexible!

We look forward to seeing you there!

Presentation List / ãƒ—ãƒ¬ã‚¼ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆ

AI with Trust: Rediscovering Quality as Human Relationship - Masanori Kawarada | Senior QA Engineer | æ ªå¼ä¼šç¤¾ã‚°ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ“ã‚¹

In a world where automation, AI, and rapid delivery are redefining our craft, human connection remains the one element that cannot be automated â€” and yet, it is what determines whether our systems truly serve people. Letâ€™s rediscover quality not as a set of metrics, but as a language of trust. Because in the end, every product is a story of how its people worked together.

Practical AI Adoption: Real Insights from the Field / å®Ÿè·µã‹ã‚‰å­¦ã¶AIæ´»ç”¨ï¼šç¾å ´ã®ãƒªã‚¢ãƒ«ãªçŸ¥è¦‹ - Masa Mizobuchi | Solutions Architect (ã‚½ãƒªãƒ¥ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã‚¢ãƒ¼ã‚­ãƒ†ã‚¯ãƒˆ) | ã‚¢ãƒã‚¾ãƒ³ã‚¦ã‚§ãƒ–ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒ“ã‚¹ã‚¸ãƒ£ãƒ‘ãƒ³

In AI adoption, decisions about "where to start" and "what to prioritize" can determine project success. In this session, I'll share practical perspectives from my position as a Solutions Architect who has worked with numerous AI projects. Referencing both successful cases and those "wait, this wasn't supposed to happen..." moments, I'll discuss key points in AI utilization. Skipping the formalities, I hope you'll take away practical tips you can use starting tomorrow.

Workshop / ãƒ¯ãƒ¼ã‚¯ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒƒãƒ—

Hands-on AI Agent Workshop: Build an AI assistant that automates your tasks! Learn the basics, real examples, and key tips for developing AI agents, and feel their power and practicality. With Google Colab, no local setup is needed. In this session, we will build an AI agent that automatically writes meeting minutes and drafts presentation outlines. Interested in saving time, automating work, or taking your first step with AI? Join us and change the way you work!

â€»Please prepare your own PC and Google account in advance for the workshop.

Rakuten Group Office Admission Rules / æ¥½å¤©ã‚°ãƒ«ãƒ¼ãƒ—ã‚ªãƒ•ã‚£ã‚¹å…¥é¤¨ãƒ«ãƒ¼ãƒ«

When you enter any of the Rakuten Group Offices, it is necessary to be aware of the items specified for the handling of information. Please read the following items before joining the tech conference. Thank you for your understanding.

  • By entering any of the Rakuten Group Offices, all information belonging to the Rakuten Group that is known to the Group shall not be used without permission and shall not be leaked to third parties.
  • Inside the office, please do not record or take photos without permission.
  • If you want to enter a place other than the designated one, please ask for permission first.
  • Should damage be caused to the Rakuten Group by violating any of the above, a claim for damages shall be made.

In addition, personal information provided by guests, as well as personal information recorded by camera is strictly managed by the company, and is used only for the purpose of entering and leaving the Rakuten Group and information management.

In addition, the contents of the agreement will be applied not only to the person who agrees but also to all accompanying persons.
